QuestData.Title: Red Blossom Leeks, You Make the Croc-in' World Go Down
QuestData.Description: Grandpa once told me that the smell of leeks will keep crocolisks off of your property. He must have had a point... he always grew leeks, and I never saw a crocolisk anywhere NEAR his farm.$b$bWe're pretty far from the water... but I suppose you can never be too sure.
QuestData.LogDescription: Plant a Red Blossom Leek in Sunsong Ranch. You can purchase seeds from Merchant Greenfield in the Halfhill Market.
